TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Adorner extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Gerencia uma coleção de interface do usuário relacionada objetos. Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> pode ser ativado e desativado. Habilitado somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objetos receberá mensagens de teste e paint ocorrências da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>. Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> podem ser exibidos como um proxy entre a interface do usuário elementos relacionados, que consistem em todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objetos e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do serviço de comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> classe interage com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classes. Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> construtor cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> e é habilitado por padrão.
## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> classe. Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Obtém ou define o associado ao .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, a coleção define essa propriedade para que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> pode chamar de volta para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

Docs.summary: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o está habilitado.
Docs.value: , se o estiver habilitada; caso contrário, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> é de propriedade `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe enviará `HitTest` e `Paint` mensagens para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como habilitar e desabilitar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>. Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: estender a aparência e comportamento de controles no modo de Design](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/CS/DesignerDemoControl.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/VB/DesignerDemoControl.vb#12)]

[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#4)]
